attributes.action: prosecute all MPs who have abused the expenses system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All MPs who have misused the expenses system for second homes should be prosecuted.  This sort of behaviour from a member of the public would not be tolerated so why should MPs get away with it?

The law applies and binds everyone in the UK, if someone commits benefit fraud or a similar offence they are met with the full extent of the law.  MPs who have abused the trust of the public and misused taxpayers money intentionally should now be held accountable for the offences they will have commited in doing so.

rejection.details: The advice from the Attorney General's office is that this is outside the PM's remit. The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way. Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have a discretion whether to investigate the matter or not and how to proceed following an investigation.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
